import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get User Custom Views"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/views"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns saved custom views for the Users module. Use this to list view definitions, discover ViewId values, and drive view management UIs.

**Workflow Example**
1. Call [GET /api/v1.0/users/views](/docs/api/users/list-user-views) with `$p`/`$s` to page results.
2. Retrieve a specific view definition via [GET /api/v1.0/users/views/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/views/get-user-view).
3. Create new views with [POST /api/v1.0/users/views/new](/docs/api/users/create-user-view) when needed.

**Minimal Required Fields**: None. Optional query params: `$p`, `$s`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"$p","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Zero-based page index to retrieve","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0},"example":0},{"name":"$s","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Number of records per page","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1},"example":20}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A list of custom views for users","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"ViewId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"Name":{"type":"string"},"Description":{"type":"string"},"OwnerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/users","responseField":"Items[].UserId"},"description":"UUID of the user (OwnerId). Obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users), extract `Items[].UserId`."}},"title":"UserView"},"title":"UserViewsListResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
